bibl.title: New Heroes in Antiquity. From Achilles to Antinoos.
bibl.note: The book began as a series of four lectures delivered at the Collège de France in March 2011. - See pp. 75-83, fig.9: Antinoos.
bibl.seg: Jones Christopher P., New Heroes in Antiquity. From Achilles to Antinoos. (Revealing Antiquity. 18.)
Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press, 2010, 8°, xii-123 pp., 10 figg. ISBN 978-0-674-03586-7. $29.95.
The book began as a series of four lectures delivered at the Collège de France in March 2011. - See pp. 75-83, fig.9: Antinoos.
